News.headline: Tickets: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.page_title: Tickets: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.URL_keywords: Tickets: North Ferriby United v Dagenham and Redbridge
News.short_description: Ticket information for the Daggers’ trip to the Eon Visual Media Stadium on Saturday 7th January, 3:00pm KO
News.description:
Please note that this game will be pay on the day only andthe Stadium will not be segregated for this game.

The prices for the game will be:
Adults £15.00
Proof of age may be requested for the following concessions:
(OAP – over 65, Students): £8.00
Under 16: £4.00
Under 12’s: admitted free if accompanied by an adult.

Disabled/Wheelchair Information:
Disabled and Wheelchair fans will have to pay the concession ticket fee with the carer going free, although the club only has four spaces for wheelchair users available, contact North Ferriby in advance if you require a disabled ticket.
